metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2742 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Exosphere in Google Chrome on Chrome OS and Lacros priorto 104.0.5112.79 allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engagein specific UI interactions to potentially exploit heap corruption viacrafted UI interactions. (Chrome security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
